SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

getValue
Class ObjectValue

java.lang.Object
  getValue.ObjectValue

public class ObjectValue
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to obtain stats about an object. Given the object's name and the database location, this class will allow the caller to return numerous stats about an object. WARNING - Unlike NPC and User Values which remain relatively unchanged from release to release, Object values are in a state of constant flux This is due to the nature of introducing new objects. Objects must be introduced at the code level and therefore new getters and setters will be introduced as new types of objects form.

Author:
Nicholas Ingalls

Constructor Summary
ObjectValue(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String objectName)
          Constructs a new object with a string containing the database location and a string containing the username.

Method Detail

getDexModifier

public java.lang.String getDexModifier()
Returns the dexterity modifier This value will be an integer percent. ie: 50 will reduce the wielder's stat by half 200 will double the stat.

Returns:
A String containing the modifier

setDexModifier

public void setDexModifier(java.lang.String dex)
sets the dexterity modifier This value will be an integer percent. ie: 50 will reduce the wielder's stat by half 200 will double the stat.

getAcidProtection

public java.lang.String getAcidProtection()
Returns whether the item provides acid protection to the user This value is modified by an integer percent. Ie. A returned value of 50% would halve the users protection A returned value of 200% would double it

Returns:
A String containing an integer percent

setAcidProtection

public void setAcidProtection(java.lang.String acid)
Sets the acid protection percent for the item

Parameters:
acid - A String containing an integer percent

getWeaponType

public java.lang.String getWeaponType()
Returns a String containing the type of damage the weapon incurs. This will be a String containing either: "acid", "fire", "hit", "magic", "pierce", "ranged", or "none" if the object is not a weapon.

Returns:
A String contaning the type of damage

setWeaponType

public void setWeaponType(java.lang.String type)
Sets the type of damage a weapon object causes

Parameters:
type - A String containing either "acid", "fire", "hit", "magic", "pierce", "ranged", or "none"

getMinDamageDesc

public java.lang.String getMinDamageDesc()
Returns the String that will be used to describe the damage if it is a third or less of the max damage

A String containing the description
